subject: [Wordfence Alert] Problems found on mets.edu.au/stage1
preview: This email was sent from your website "METS Training Services" by the Wordfence plugin. Wordfence found the following new issues on "METS Training Services" (9 existing issues were also found again).

full_threads.body:
This email was sent from your website "METS Training Services" by the Wordfence plugin.

Wordfence found the following new issues on "METS Training Services" (9 existing issues were also found again).

Alert generated at Friday 12th of September 2025 at 10:11:55 PM


See the details of these scan results on your site at: https://mets.edu.au/stage1/wp-admin/admin.php?page=WordfenceScan

Medium Severity Problems:

* The Plugin "Image Optimizer - Compress, Resize and Optimize Images" needs an upgrade (1.6.7 -> 1.6.8).

https://wordpress.org/plugins/image-optimization/#developers

* The Plugin "LiteSpeed Cache" needs an upgrade (7.4 -> 7.5.0.1).

https://wordpress.org/plugins/litespeed-cache/#developers

* The Plugin "WPvivid Backup Plugin" needs an upgrade (0.9.118 -> 0.9.119).

https://wordpress.org/plugins/wpvivid-backuprestore/#developers

* The Plugin "Ultimate Addons for Elementor Pro" needs an upgrade (1.40.2 -> 1.40.3).

http://ultimateelementor.com/pricing/?utm_source=license-form&utm_medium=uael-purchase&utm_campaign=graupi-license-form/#developers

9 existing issues were found again and are not shown.

NOTE: You are using the free version of Wordfence. Upgrade today:

  • Receive real-time Firewall and Scan engine rule updates for protection as threats emerge
  • Real-time IP Blocklist blocks the most malicious IPs from accessing your site
  • Country blocking
  • IP reputation monitoring
  • Schedule scans to run more frequently and at optimal times
  • Access to Premium Support
  • Discounts for multi-year and multi-license purchases

Click here to upgrade to Wordfence Premium:
